Gain Headhunter points by killing Champions or Bosses to increase material Damage.
击杀将级敌人或Boss以获得“猎首”点数，“猎首”点数能提高物质伤害。

“Recall this when you ride to battle. We fight not for pleasure, cruelty, or political favour. We fight for the tomorrow of mankind. When you hold your foe before you, strike deep. Strike true.” Gernese, Eos of the Brotherhood of Dawn _________________________________________________________ “One trainee whom I won’t name came to me and said: ‘I’m near the end of my training but Anathëa has never come to me. What am I doing wrong?’ Here’s my answer: We cannot ask the Lady of Dawn to carry each and every one of our hopes. If I am able to burn the impious, it’s only because I refract the light of my fellows. Be beacons to one another. As you plunge your swords into the enemy, as you blind them with the Lady’s light, deafen them with the Searing Song, remember: Anathëa is by your side when you do battle, she’s in the temples when the Hierophants sing, she’s in the lightness of your heart as you retire in the evenings.”

“当你驰骋疆场时，请谨记这一点。我们的战斗不是为了追求愉悦、残忍、或是所谓的政治正确。我们是在为了人类的明天而搏杀。当你压制住你的敌人时，下手必须狠而准。” 格尼斯，黎明兄弟会的黎明神官 _________________________________________________________ “一个我不方便透露名字的老学员曾经过来问过我这样一件事：‘我的训练快要结束了，可我还是没有见到安娜蒂亚。是我做错了什么吗？’我的回答是： 我们不能奢求黎明女神承载我们所有人的愿望。如果我有能力燃尽那些不敬神者，那仅仅是因为我在折射着我同伴们的光。我们之间彼此映照着。当你的利刃砍进敌人的身躯，用女神的光芒刺瞎他们的双目，用激昂的圣歌淹没他们的双耳时，记住：当你战斗时，安娜蒂亚就奋力搏杀的你的身侧，当牧师诵经时，她就在庄严的神殿之中，当你入夜休憩时，她就在你心中那抹光明之中。”
Sacred Damage can kill enemies instantly if their Health is low.
神圣伤害能直接斩杀残血敌人。

“Don’t despair! With me, now! Show them how our faith shields us before calamity!” Gernese, Eos of the Brotherhood of Dawn _________________________________________________________ “One trainee whom I won’t name came to me and said: ‘I’m near the end of my training but Anathëa has never come to me. What am I doing wrong?’ Here’s my answer: We cannot ask the Lady of Dawn to carry each and every one of our hopes. If I am able to burn the impious, it’s only because I refract the light of my fellows. Be beacons to one another. As you plunge your swords into the enemy, as you blind them with the Lady’s light, deafen them with the Searing Song, remember: Anathëa is by your side when you do battle, she’s in the temples when the Hierophants sing, she’s in the lightness of your heart as you retire in the evenings.”

“不要气馁！来，站到我的身边！让他们看看在灾难之下我们的信仰能成为多么坚固的壁垒！” 格尼斯，黎明兄弟会的黎明神官 _________________________________________________________ “一个我不方便透露名字的老学员曾经过来问过我这样一件事：‘我的训练快要结束了，可我还是没有见到安娜蒂亚。是我做错了什么吗？’我的回答是： 我们不能奢求黎明女神承载我们所有人的愿望。如果我有能力燃尽那些不敬神者，那仅仅是因为我在折射着我同伴们的光。我们之间彼此映照着。当你的利刃砍进敌人的身躯，用女神的光芒刺瞎他们的双目，用激昂的圣歌灌注他们的双耳时，记住：当你战斗时，安娜蒂亚就在你的身侧，当牧师诵经时，她就在庄严的神殿之中，当你入夜休憩时，她就在你心中那抹光明里。”
Pray when your Health is low to resurrect and buff allies.
你残血时通过祈祷复活并强化盟友。

“I don’t know how or why I was granted this gift. But by spell and by sword, I will use it in service of the Lady of Dawn, and see the sun rise once again for mankind.” Gernese, Eos of the Brotherhood of Dawn _________________________________________________________ “One trainee whom I won’t name came to me and said: ‘I’m near the end of my training but Anathëa has never come to me. What am I doing wrong?’ Here’s my answer: We cannot ask the Lady of Dawn to carry each and every one of our hopes. If I am able to burn the impious, it’s only because I refract the light of my fellows. Be beacons to one another. As you plunge your swords into the enemy, as you blind them with the Lady’s light, deafen them with the Searing Song, remember: Anathëa is by your side when you do battle, she’s in the temples when the Hierophants sing, she’s in the lightness of your heart as you retire in the evenings.”

“我不知道我是如何或为何而得到这份天资。但是透过利剑与法术，我将用这份能力侍奉黎明女神，并亲眼见证太阳重新为人类而升起。” 格尼斯，黎明兄弟会的黎明神官 _________________________________________________________ “一个我不方便透露名字的老学员曾经过来问过我这样一件事：‘我的训练快要结束了，可我还是没有见到安娜蒂亚。是我做错了什么吗？’我的回答是： 我们不能奢求黎明女神承载我们所有人的愿望。如果我有能力燃尽那些不敬神者，那仅仅是因为我在折射着我同伴们的光。我们之间彼此映照着。当你的利刃砍进敌人的身躯，用女神的光芒刺瞎他们的双目，用激昂的圣歌淹没他们的双耳时，记住：当你战斗时，安娜蒂亚就奋力搏杀的你的身侧，当牧师诵经时，她就在庄严的神殿之中，当你入夜休憩时，她就在你心中那抹光明之中。”
Increases sacred Damage for attacks or spells based on your remaining Force Shield. Only works if your Force Shield is above 0.
根据你剩余的护盾为你的攻击或法术提供额外神圣伤害。最大护盾高于0时才能生效。

“Not one of the usurpers knows how to use their power. Too focused on retaining their form and identity to submit themselves to authentic evolution.” Ashoret, Prophet of Trinity _________________________________________________________ Ever since the Primordial of Change split into three parts — Etheliel, Beelmalik and Abanazaar — its name was forgotten by all but one. Prophet Ashoret, last worshipper of Change, despised its three usurpers: spoiled children petrified of all things unfamiliar, the cause of the world’s stagnation. Ashoret devised a plan to bring Change back. He stole power from the three Fallen Primordials’ faithful, combining them into a cataclysmic storm. He ripped the roofs from their temples, cursed the bodies of worshippers to burst with elemental might, annihilating their congregations. Until the Primordial of Change rises from his progeny’s ashes, the omnistorm will walk.

“没有一个篡位者知道如何正确使用他们的力量。他们过度专注于保留自己的个性而不遵从本源实现真正的蜕变。” 阿索雷特，三元先知 _________________________________________________________ 自从变革之源分裂成三部分——耶特利尔，比马利克和阿巴纳扎——他的名字就只被一个人铭记。 先知阿索雷特，变革最后的追随者，极其鄙视它的三名篡位者：他们是象牙塔中骄纵的孩子，对一切的陌生事物恐惧畏缩，它们就是世界停滞不前的根源。阿索雷特设计了一个让变革重新回归的计划。他从三位堕落元素神的信仰中窃取力量，用来构建一场灾难性的风暴。他掀翻了信徒们的神庙，用元素之力的诅咒令他们爆体而亡，将他们的教会彻底抹除。 除非变革之源从元素神的灰烬中复生，这场毁灭的风暴永远都不会停歇。
Gain Accords buffs based on the elemental Damage used to increase Damage, critical chance score, or ailment chance score.
根据技能造成的元素伤害类型赋予你相应的“协议”，提供暴击几率值、伤害加成或异常状态几率值。
Increases the number of simultaneous Accords.
增加可以同时激活的“协议”数。

“If I lose my form, if I lose ‘me’, it will only be a passage into another state. Don’t weep or smile in my defeat, for I am ever victorious.” Ashoret, Prophet of Trinity _________________________________________________________ Ever since the Primordial of Change split into three parts — Etheliel, Beelmalik and Abanazaar — its name was forgotten by all but one. Prophet Ashoret, last worshipper of Change, despised its three usurpers: spoiled children petrified of all things unfamiliar, the cause of the world’s stagnation. Ashoret devised a plan to bring Change back. He stole power from the three Fallen Primordials’ faithful, combining them into a cataclysmic storm. He ripped the roofs from their temples, cursed the bodies of worshippers to burst with elemental might, annihilating their congregations. Until the Primordial of Change rises from his progeny’s ashes, the omnistorm will walk.

“如果我失去了我的皮囊，失去了“我”自身，那不过是进入了另一种形态。不要为我的失败而哭泣或微笑，因为我永远是胜利者。” 阿索雷特，三元先知 _________________________________________________________ 自从变革之源分裂成三部分——耶特利尔，比马利克和阿巴纳扎——他的名字就只被一个人铭记。 先知阿索雷特，变革最后的追随者，极其鄙视它的三名篡位者：他们是象牙塔中骄纵的孩子，对一切的陌生事物恐惧畏缩，它们就是世界停滞不前的根源。阿索雷特设计了一个让变革重新回归的计划。他从三位堕落元素神的信仰中窃取力量，用来构建一场灾难性的风暴。他掀翻了信徒们的神庙，用元素之力的诅咒令他们爆体而亡，将他们的教会彻底抹除。 除非变革之源从元素神的灰烬中复生，这场毁灭的风暴永远都不会停歇。
Triggers an elemental explosion around you based on your Health or Force Shield when you use a skill with a low Willpower gauge. The Damage type is randomly chosen between lightning, frost and fire.
魔力低于一定百分比时施放技能会根据你的最大生命值或最大护盾值在你身边制造元素爆炸。爆炸伤害的类型从冰霜、火焰、闪电中随机选取。

“We have guarded ourselves from the elements with thick walls and stone foundations. This isn’t how we were meant to be. We’ve grown soft. Weak. But I will help everyone recall the true potential of their bodies.” Ashoret, Prophet of Trinity _________________________________________________________ Ever since the Primordial of Change split into three parts — Etheliel, Beelmalik and Abanazaar — its name was forgotten by all but one. Prophet Ashoret, last worshipper of Change, despised its three usurpers: spoiled children petrified of all things unfamiliar, the cause of the world’s stagnation. Ashoret devised a plan to bring Change back. He stole power from the three Fallen Primordials’ faithful, combining them into a cataclysmic storm. He ripped the roofs from their temples, cursed the bodies of worshippers to burst with elemental might, annihilating their congregations. Until the Primordial of Change rises from his progeny’s ashes, the omnistorm will walk.

“一直以来，我们用周密的保护让自己免受元素的侵袭。我们不应该如此。我们变得无力而软弱。但是我会让每个人回想起他们身体的真正潜力。” 阿索雷特，三元先知 _________________________________________________________ 自从变革之源分裂成三部分——耶特利尔，比马利克和阿巴纳扎——他的名字就只被一个人铭记。 先知阿索雷特，变革最后的追随者，极其鄙视它的三名篡位者：他们是象牙塔中骄纵的孩子，对一切的陌生事物恐惧畏缩，它们就是世界停滞不前的根源。阿索雷特设计了一个让变革重新回归的计划。他从三位堕落元素神的信仰中窃取力量，用来构建一场灾难性的风暴。他掀翻了信徒们的神庙，用元素之力的诅咒令他们爆体而亡，将他们的教会彻底抹除。 除非变革之源从元素神的灰烬中复生，这场毁灭的风暴永远都不会停歇。
Elemental skills can trigger spells based on their Damage type.
元素技能会触发一项法术，法术取决于技能的元素类型。

“There’s great treasures to be found in a corpse. Only people are much too… skittish.” Kiraan, Corpse Stalker _________________________________________________________ Kiraan was the only child of his generation to survive the Prestwich plague. He spent his days with the terminally ill, watching their lives slip away with macabre curiosity. His penchant for death and immunity to the plague earned him the nickname of ‘Corpse Stalker’. He was exiled into the waiting arms of the Cult of Bezeriel. Kiraan soon mastered poison and death magic, his aptitude unsettling fellow cultists. He grew weary of the cult’s old dogma and resolved to start a new sect to harvest faith from the agonizing. As his army of the undead grows, his vision approaches fruition: a world permanently on the brink of extinction, fuelling his putrid patron with the faith of the desperate.

“在尸体里可以找到很多宝藏。只是人们对这种事太…敏感。” 基兰，觅尸者 _________________________________________________________ 基兰是他那一代人中唯一活过普雷斯特维奇瘟疫的孩子。他对死亡的嗜好和对瘟疫的免疫力让他得到了“觅尸者”的绰号。他被放逐后便投身贝塞瑞尔教派的怀抱。 基兰很快就精通了毒药与死灵术，他的天资令其他的教徒坐立不安。他渐渐对教派的陈规戒律感到厌倦并决心建立一个全新的教派，并以此从痛苦中收割信仰。随着他的亡灵军团的壮大，他的梦想即将实现: 一个永远处于灭绝边缘的世界，绝望者用他们的信仰供奉着他们堕落的庇护者。
Stack green globes dropped by enemies killed nearby to increase your toxic Damage.
捡起附近死亡的敌人掉落的绿球以堆叠层数，获得额外毒素伤害。
Summons that die near you also drop a green globe.
在你附近死去的召唤物也会掉落绿球。

“Weak. Weak, weak, weak. These lungs weren’t built for this world. To live is to decay, to slowly poison yourself. Why not decay indefinitely? Why does it have to end?” Kiraan, Corpse Stalker _________________________________________________________ Kiraan was the only child of his generation to survive the Prestwich plague. He spent his days with the terminally ill, watching their lives slip away with macabre curiosity. His penchant for death and immunity to the plague earned him the nickname of ‘Corpse Stalker’. He was exiled into the waiting arms of the Cult of Bezeriel. Kiraan soon mastered poison and death magic, his aptitude unsettling fellow cultists. He grew weary of the cult’s old dogma and resolved to start a new sect to harvest faith from the agonizing. As his army of the undead grows, his vision approaches fruition: a world permanently on the brink of extinction, fuelling his putrid patron with the faith of the desperate.

“太弱了。太弱了，太弱了，太弱了。这些肺部根本就不是能在这个世界上生存下来的类型。活着就是在腐败，在一点点毒害自己。为什么不一直腐败下去？为什么腐败一定要有极限？” 基兰，觅尸者 _________________________________________________________ 基兰是他那一代人中唯一活过普雷斯特维奇瘟疫的孩子。他对死亡的嗜好和对瘟疫的免疫力让他得到了“觅尸者”的绰号。他被放逐后便投身贝塞瑞尔教派的怀抱。 基兰很快就精通了毒药与死灵术，他的天资令其他的教徒坐立不安。他渐渐对教派的陈规戒律感到厌倦并决心建立一个全新的教派，并以此从痛苦中收割信仰。随着他的亡灵军团的壮大，他的梦想即将实现: 一个永远处于灭绝边缘的世界，绝望者用他们的信仰供奉着他们堕落的庇护者。
Apply a poison stack every few seconds to enemies around.
当敌人靠近你时，每隔几秒会受到一层中毒状态。

“It’s odd, to speak with the living mortal. They perceive consciousness as limited to one body. They haven’t known... liberation.” Kiraan, Corpse Stalker _________________________________________________________ Kiraan was the only child of his generation to survive the Prestwich plague. He spent his days with the terminally ill, watching their lives slip away with macabre curiosity. His penchant for death and immunity to the plague earned him the nickname of ‘Corpse Stalker’. He was exiled into the waiting arms of the Cult of Bezeriel. Kiraan soon mastered poison and death magic, his aptitude unsettling fellow cultists. He grew weary of the cult’s old dogma and resolved to start a new sect to harvest faith from the agonizing. As his army of the undead grows, his vision approaches fruition: a world permanently on the brink of extinction, fuelling his putrid patron with the faith of the desperate.

“跟活人说话实在是很奇怪。他们总以为意识仅仅局限于一副肉体。他们还没认识到什么叫……自由。” 基兰，觅尸者 _________________________________________________________ 基兰是他那一代人中唯一活过普雷斯特维奇瘟疫的孩子。他对死亡的嗜好和对瘟疫的免疫力让他得到了“觅尸者”的绰号。他被放逐后便投身贝塞瑞尔教派的怀抱。 基兰很快就精通了毒药与死灵术，他的天资令其他的教徒坐立不安。他渐渐对教派的陈规戒律感到厌倦并决心建立一个全新的教派，并以此从痛苦中收割信仰。随着他的亡灵军团的壮大，他的梦想即将实现: 一个永远处于灭绝边缘的世界，绝望者用他们的信仰供奉着他们堕落的庇护者。
Reduce Health and Force Shield to improve the defences of your summons.
降低你的最大生命值和最大护盾，但你的召唤物将获得伤害减免。

“You’re the same as every other so-called master I’ve studied under. You weaken yourself for the sake of a tradition, learn mediocre moves because of the name on the manual. In the next life, don’t waste my time.” Satine, Baroness of Tissarine _________________________________________________________ No mercenary is quite as legendary as Satine, Mistress of Arms. Having trained under weapon masters of many disciplines, she’s guarded herself from any weakness. Hired alongside others to snuff out a rebel militia in Laibon, she emerged from their lair drenched in blood, having killed all of them alone. With the momentous reward for this deed, she built the town of Tissarine. Lords who try to hire her often fail, as she no longer values gold.  Her single-minded pursuit is a rare wildflower, the Black Aster. Some say she seeks it for poison, others for a private collection. None dare ask. She works for whoever can source them, one legend pursuing another with unmatched martial skill.

“你跟我所学习过的那些所谓的大师是一类人。你为了照顾传统而自我束缚，仅仅因为他们在手册上的名字而学习一些垃圾花架式。下辈子记住，别来浪费我的时间。” 萨蒂娜，提萨林的男爵夫人 _________________________________________________________ 没有一个雇佣兵能像武装夫人萨蒂娜那样具有传奇色彩。在许多不同门类武器大师的训练下，她的战技完美无瑕。她曾经和其他人一起被雇来消灭莱邦的一个反叛民兵组织，当她独自一人浑身浴血地走出基地时，留下的只有一地尸体。她用这次行动的高额酬金建造了蒂萨林镇。 试图雇佣她的领主经常失败，因为她不再看重金钱。 她一心一意追求的是一种罕见的野花——黑紫菀。有人说她是为了毒药，也有人说是为了私人收藏。但是没有一个人胆敢问她。她为任何能找到这种花的人工作，作为一个传说，她用她无与伦比的武技追求着另一个传说。
Access the Probing Weakness and Stalwart Resolve stances to increase offensive or defensive characteristics at the cost of their opposite.
通过翻滚在“寻隙”姿态和“忠贞”姿态间切换，以在攻防两端牺牲一端强化另一端。

“I’ve never allowed anyone to put me on the defence, and you’re certainly not the one to break that rule. Or do you have that dexterity? Can you keep timing your swings as the blood drums in your ears, warning you of impending death?” Satine, Baroness of Tissarine _________________________________________________________ No mercenary is quite as legendary as Satine, Mistress of Arms. Having trained under weapon masters of many disciplines, she’s guarded herself from any weakness. Hired alongside others to snuff out a rebel militia in Laibon, she emerged from their lair drenched in blood, having killed all of them alone. With the momentous reward for this deed, she built the town of Tissarine. Lords who try to hire her often fail, as she no longer values gold.  Her single-minded pursuit is a rare wildflower, the Black Aster. Some say she seeks it for poison, others for a private collection. None dare ask. She works for whoever can source them, one legend pursuing another with unmatched martial skill.

“我从来没让任何人逼得我防御，你也显然不是那个能打破这条规则的人。又或者说你能达到这个速度吗？听着血液在耳中鼓动，像战鼓提醒着你死到临头之时，你还能控制自己的身体好好移动吗？” 萨蒂娜，提萨林的男爵夫人 _________________________________________________________ 没有一个雇佣兵能像武装夫人萨蒂娜那样具有传奇色彩。在许多不同门类武器大师的训练下，她的战技完美无瑕。她曾经和其他人一起被雇来消灭莱邦的一个反叛民兵组织，当她独自一人浑身浴血地走出基地时，留下的只有一地尸体。她用这次行动的高额酬金建造了蒂萨林镇。 试图雇佣她的领主经常失败，因为她不再看重金钱。 她一心一意追求的是一种罕见的野花——黑紫菀。有人说她是为了毒药，也有人说是为了私人收藏。但是没有一个人胆敢问她。她为任何能找到这种花的人工作，作为一个传说，她用她无与伦比的武技追求着另一个传说。
当你格挡一名敌人的攻击时，你立即造成一定比例武器伤害的反击。

“Retract your statements. It isn’t my fault you expected a mere fencing match. In a real fight, no-one takes a step back for fair play’s sake. I am not only a warrior, I am the warrior, and I won’t lower myself to acting as a dancing puppet for your entertainment.” Satine, Baroness of Tissarine _________________________________________________________ No mercenary is quite as legendary as Satine, Mistress of Arms. Having trained under weapon masters of many disciplines, she’s guarded herself from any weakness. Hired alongside others to snuff out a rebel militia in Laibon, she emerged from their lair drenched in blood, having killed all of them alone. With the momentous reward for this deed, she built the town of Tissarine. Some say she seeks it for poison, others for a private collection. None dare ask. She works for whoever can source them, one legend pursuing another with unmatched martial skill.

“请收回你的言论。你以为这只是一场击剑比赛，这是你的问题。在真正的决斗中，公平较量绝无退缩。我不只是个战士，我更是个勇士，我可不会作贱自己扮演跳舞的木偶供你取乐。” 萨蒂娜，提萨林的男爵夫人 _________________________________________________________ 没有一个雇佣兵能像武装夫人萨蒂娜那样具有传奇色彩。在许多不同门类武器大师的训练下，她的战技完美无瑕。她曾经和其他人一起被雇来消灭莱邦的一个反叛民兵组织，当她独自一人浑身浴血地走出基地时，留下的只有一地尸体。她用这次行动的高额酬金建造了提萨林镇。 试图雇佣她的领主经常失败，因为她不再看重金钱。 她一心一意追求的是一种罕见的野花——黑紫菀。有人说她是为了毒药，也有人说是为了私人收藏。但是没有一个人胆敢问她。她为任何能找到这种花的人工作，作为一个传说，她用她无与伦比的武技追求着另一个传说。
The fourth weapon combo has a special effect.
武器连击的第四下拥有特殊效果。

"..." Loudmouth, Blaze of Geldspar _________________________________________________________ The most destructive fires begin with the faintest spark. The Geldspar installation of the Brotherhood of Dawn had processed hundreds of exorcisms when they found a giant mute known by locals as Loudmouth. His signs of possession were faint, yet when he awoke, madness ripped through him. He tore through the exorcists, fire scorching everything in his wake. His axes hit flesh in rapid percussive impacts. To that rhythm, the fire soon died down into embers and char: the Fury Demon had lost its hold on Loudmouth. From the smoke, two shadowy hands came to rest on his face, and a voice whispered to him: “Follow me. Let’s fix this together.” Remorseful and uncertain of his purpose on this earth, he obeyed.

"..." 大嘴，盖斯帕之火 _________________________________________________________ 最具破坏性的火灾始于最微弱的火花。 自从驻在盖斯帕的黎明兄弟会发现一个被当敌人称作大嘴的哑巴巨人之后，他们已经进行过数百次的驱魔仪式了。他并没有什么占有欲，但是当他从睡梦中醒来时就会陷入狂暴。他将驱魔人撕的粉碎，他身后留下的只有被火吞噬的一切。他的斧头快速而有力的打击着所有的生物。 拜他的狂暴所赐，火焰很快就熄灭了，余下的只有一地的灰烬和焦炭：暴怒的狂魔从大嘴的身上退去了。在弥漫的烟雾中，一双隐秘之手抚摸着他的脸颊，一个声音对他轻声耳语：“跟我来吧，我们来修复这一切。”后悔而迷茫，本来就不知道自己该何去何从的他选择了遵从。
Passively regenerate Rage instead of Willpower.
你的魔力自动回复改为怒气回复。
If your Rage is above a certain threshold, your skills deal twice their Damage, but cost more to use.
当你的怒气高于一定界限时，你的技能造成双倍伤害，但消耗也会增加。

"..." Loudmouth, Blaze of Geldspar _________________________________________________________ The most destructive fires begin with the faintest spark. The Geldspar installation of the Brotherhood of Dawn had processed hundreds of exorcisms when they found a giant mute known by locals as Loudmouth. His signs of possession were faint, yet when he awoke, madness ripped through him. He tore through the exorcists, fire scorching everything in his wake. His axes hit flesh in rapid percussive impacts. To that rhythm, the fire soon died down into embers and char: the Fury Demon had lost its hold on Loudmouth. From the smoke, two shadowy hands came to rest on his face, and a voice whispered to him: “Follow me. Let’s fix this together.” Remorseful and uncertain of his purpose on this earth, he obeyed.

"..." 大嘴，盖斯帕之火 _________________________________________________________ 最具破坏性的火灾始于最微弱的火花。 自从驻在盖斯帕的黎明兄弟会发现一个被当敌人称作大嘴的哑巴巨人之后，他们已经进行过数百次的驱魔仪式了。他并没有什么占有欲，但是当他从睡梦中醒来时就会陷入狂暴。他将驱魔人撕的粉碎，他身后留下的只有被火吞噬的一切。他的斧头快速而有力的打击着所有的生物。 拜他的狂暴所赐，火焰很快就熄灭了，余下的只有一地的灰烬和焦炭：暴怒的狂魔从大嘴的身上退去了。在弥漫的烟雾中，一双隐秘之手抚摸着他的脸颊，一个声音对他轻声耳语：“跟我来吧，我们来修复这一切。”后悔而迷茫，本来就不知道自己该何去何从的他选择了遵从。
Chance to increase Damage based on the amount of burn stacks on enemies.
基于敌人身上的燃烧层数提高伤害。

"..." Loudmouth, Blaze of Geldspar _________________________________________________________ The most destructive fires begin with the faintest spark. The Geldspar installation of the Brotherhood of Dawn had processed hundreds of exorcisms when they found a giant mute known by locals as Loudmouth. His signs of possession were faint, yet when he awoke, madness ripped through him. He tore through the exorcists, fire scorching everything in his wake. His axes hit flesh in rapid percussive impacts. To that rhythm, the fire soon died down into embers and char: the Fury Demon had lost its hold on Loudmouth. From the smoke, two shadowy hands came to rest on his face, and a voice whispered to him: “Follow me. Let’s fix this together.” Remorseful and uncertain of his purpose on this earth, he obeyed.

Gain Unleashed Fury points on hit to increase life leech and attack speed and reduce resistance score.
每当你击中一个敌人，会得到一个“暴怒”点数。每个“暴怒”点数都会给你提供攻击速度和吸血，但会降低你的全抗值。

“Primary target located. Selecting secondary target for purposes of electric feedback.” Alastor #273 _________________________________________________________ All Alastor #273 knew was service to the Republic. But when his Ascended abilities manifested, he realized his life would become forfeit in his masters’ eyes should they find out. He sought a lord who’d value his skills. The Cult of Ezaneal required a hand to test the engines of chaos. They plugged metal and wire into him, neutralized hunger and pain, armed him with turrets and electric gauntlets. Empowered, he returned to the Republic Disposing of any witnesses to his powers, he rose to fame by executing an Edict for the Prince of Vulkaïn. Scholars would debate the ripples of this assassination, but Alastor #273 only felt the satisfaction of a target eliminated.

“主目标已锁定。选择第二目标作为电反馈目标。” 行刑者 273号 _________________________________________________________ 行刑者 273号知道的唯一一件事就是为共和国服务。但是当他的晋升能力显现出来时，他意识到如果这个能力被他的主人们发现，他将会被废弃。于是他找到了一个重视他的能力的领主。 伊扎尼尔教团需要一个帮手替他们测试混沌引擎。他们将金属和线路添进他的身体，填补了他的饥饿与痛苦，为他装备上炮台和电气抓手。他全副武装地回到了共和国。 为了处理掉那些所有见过他能力的人，他通过推行伏尔甘王子的法令从而扬名立万。学者们用他们的喉舌压住了暗杀的风波，而行刑者 273号仅仅为他干掉了一个目标而感到满意。
Gain Overload points with basic attacks to increase Damage, and double the Damage bonus on skill use.
普攻获得提供伤害加成的“过载”点数。当你使用技能时，移除所有“过载”点数，该技能享受这些“过载”点数双倍的增益。

You have an additional resource: Power Charge points. Power Charge points are consumed with the usual resource for device and lightning skills, and increase their Damage if its value is positive. Damage is reduced if the value is negative.
让你具有“电荷”点数。该点数可以作用于任何装置技能和闪电基础伤害技能。其取值范围在-100到100之间。当电荷数值为正时，提高你的伤害，值为负时，降低你的伤害。
击杀燃烧的敌人获得的火焰伤害奖励
击杀冻结的敌人获得的冰霜伤害奖励
击杀感电的敌人获得的闪电伤害奖励
击杀眩晕的敌人获得的物理伤害奖励
击杀流血的敌人获得的撕裂伤害奖励
神圣伤害（击杀被虚弱的敌人）
击杀受诅咒的敌人获得的暗影伤害奖励
击杀中毒的敌人获得的毒素伤害奖励
击杀停滞的敌人获得的以太伤害奖励
Increased Chance to inflict all Ailment types on enemies
增加你对敌人造成所有种类异常状态的几率
Each Headhunter point grants a Material Damage bonus
每个“猎首”点数会为物质伤害提供一定的增益
Chance for Attacks to deal double Damage while losing All Resistances
攻击时有机会造成双倍伤害同时降低自身全抗性
Increased Block Chance and Block Efficiency at the cost of reduced Attack and Spellcasting Speed
以降低攻速和施法速度为代价增加格挡几率和格挡效率
